messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai-related news articles
messages.msgSnippet: Folk- Dropping off the list in order to leave Japan and start all over in California, Look forward to talking Samurai with all of you again in a few weeks
messages.messageBody:
Folk-
Dropping off the list in order to leave Japan and start all over in California, Look forward to
talking Samurai with all of you again in a few weeks time.

Tom

messages.subject: [samuraihistory] question
messages.msgSnippet: I have a question. I heard about a woman named Tomoe Gozen unfortunately I do not know anything about her except that she is a woman-samurai...can anyone tell
messages.messageBody:
I have a question. I heard about a woman named Tomoe
Gozen unfortunately I do not know anything about her
except that she is a woman-samurai...can anyone tell
me more about Tomoe Gozen?
-Polly

messages.subject: Samurai-related news articles
messages.msgSnippet: I ve updated the news section - http://www.samurai- archives.com/news.html - Due to lack of home internet access for about a month, I haven t been able to do
messages.messageBody:
I've updated the 'news' section - http://www.samurai-
archives.com/news.html - Due to lack of home internet access for
about a month, I haven't been able to do much, but now I'm back, so
take a look at the 3 newest articles, two from the yomiuri shimbun,
and one from the Asahi shimbun.
Interesting stuff.
